mapper.select: SELECT onelinereview_id, book_id, onelinereview_content, score, reg_id FROM onelinereview WHERE 1=1 AND reg_id=#{regId} AND book_id=#{bookId} AND delete_ornot='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT /* insertOnelineContent */ INTO onelinereview ( book_id, onelinereview_content, reg_id, reg_date, modify_id, modify_date, delete_ornot ) VALUES ( #{bookId}, #{onelinereviewContent}, #{regId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{regId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'N' )

INSERT /* insertOnelineScore */ INTO onelinereview ( book_id, score, reg_id, reg_date, modify_id, modify_date, delete_ornot ) VALUES ( #{bookId}, #{score}, #{regId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{regId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'N' )
